project_descr: Tropical Storm Erika produced intense rainfall causing flash flooding.  As of August 30, 2015, twenty persons confirmed dead. The Government has also reported 574 persons are homeless, 300 evacuated and 267 in shelters.

outputs.output_descr: Tropical Storm Erika produced intense rainfall causing flash flooding.  As of August 30, 2015, twenty persons confirmed dead. The Government has also reported 574 persons are homeless, 300 evacuated and 267 in shelters.
